ctx: induction s as [| h t IH].
exceptions.exn: In environment h : R t : seq R i' : nat H : sorted Rle (h :: t) H0 : (S i' < size (h :: t))%nat x0 : R IH : sorted Rle t -> (S i' < size t)%nat -> head x0 t <= nth x0 t (S i') Unable to unify "head x0 t <= nth x0 t (S i')" with "h <= nth x0 t i'".

original: intros s i H_sorted H_size x0. induction s as [| h t IH]. - intros H_lt. inversion H_lt. - intros H_lt. destruct i as [| i']. + simpl. apply H_sorted. + simpl. apply IH. * apply sorted_behead. apply H_sorted. * apply lt_S_n. apply H_size.
